history.narrative: Law 5-72 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-135, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 3, 1984, and January 31, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 16, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-107 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
